channel.title: CVE Feed for Qualcomm, Inc. -- Snapdragon Mobile, Snapdragon Wear
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Qualcomm, Inc. -- Snapdragon Mobile, Snapdragon Wear

item.title: CVE-2015-9136|2024-09-17T00:06:07.700Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20mobile%2C%20snapdragon%20wear
item.description: In Android before 2018-04-05 or earlier security patch level on Qualcomm Snapdragon Mobile and Snapdragon Wear MDM9206, MDM9607, MDM9640, MDM9650, SD 210/SD 212/SD 205, SD 425, SD 430, SD 450, SD 600, SD 625, SD 650/52, SD 808, SD 810, SD 820, SD 835, and SDX20, in pre-auth request, Host driver uses FT IEs sent by the supplicant. A buffer overflow may occur if FT IEs sent by the supplicant are larger than the expected value.
